comment.body:
Yes, climate is changing, and climate changes all the time. Or, once every 400 years the Sun goes into a minimal state of activity which has a direct effect on our climate, has to do with solar energy output and the magnetic fields.
I'd like everyone to know that things are about to get a lot worse, colder, more extreme, and overall more unpredictable weather. The main problem (is and) will be crop losses, due to unfavorable climate. I suggest everyone to look up Adapt 2030:

- [Mini Ice Age Conversations (Adapt2030's podcast)](https://adapt2030.libsyn.com/)
- [Adapt2030's YouTube channel](https://www.youtube.com/user/MyanmarLiving)

@Bussdee: I know this isn't (gonna be) pretty, but  climate is in fact changing though you have been lied to about its causes (not CO2 but the Sun) and it's predictions (it's not going to get warmer on average).
I wish climate wasn't changing myself, but that'd be naive, the people who are in power and want to stay in power are simply using natural cycles in climate to control the people, because we haven't been taught about the real causes of climate change throughout history.
Neat idea. Though it might be a good idea to support all certificates not just ZeroID, there might be an issue with uniqueness of certificate issuer names, but still.
And you think you've been taught truthful information in your school and mass media? Get off your high horse.
@Radioangel: Sadly no one is exempt from disinformation, lack of information or the power of suggestion. Truthful information is rare these days.

@Colkurtz: ZeroNet can still be censored by the site or hub owner, and ZeroNet cannot withstand many attacks. I think I might attack ZeroNet one day just to proof people that ZeroNet's security is shit ;)
He was jailed for contempt of court, and he's not someone worth your time: https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/6409887/what-tommy-robinson-done-edl-leader-jailed-release-latest/
